title: What is "Riot U"?

embed.description: We work in a collaborative, fast-paced and learning-rich environment with a veteran development team anchored by accomplished leaders in engineering, design, art, publishing and more. We're always looking for talented and driven people to join us as we strive to create player-focused games.

body: When i was reading "PERKS BEYOND THE NORM" in the working at riot page, i noticed that it had "Ongoing education and training through Riot U" i was wondering what that was.

replies.body: Riot University. :D  it's pretty much what the description says, various courses, training and education that can help level up various skills. For example, I just took a course on Agile Fundamentals.
Sounds good, but i bet it's pretty expensive?
